basic.description: May be repeated to a maximum of eight semester hours.
basic.subject: BSC
basic.title: Selected Topics in Biological Science

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BSC 2010, BSC 2010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L, junior or senior standing.
